code: import{use,useEffect,useState}from"react";import{API_URL}from"../../url";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RealizarCheckIn(_ref){let{id}=_ref;const[infosReservas,setInfosReserva]=useState([]);const[horarioCheckIn,setHorarioCheckIn]=useState("");const buscarReservaUnica=async()=>{const buscar=await fetch(`${API_URL}/buscarReservaUnica`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({id})});const dados=await buscar.json();setInfosReserva(dados);};useEffect(()=>{buscarReservaUnica();const data=new Date();setHorarioCheckIn(data);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Hor\xE1rio da entrada"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:horarioCheckIn})]})})});}export default RealizarCheckIn;
